statements: SELECT * FROM camera_calibration;
SELECT id, camera_model, focal_length FROM camera_calibration;
SELECT camera_model, sensor_width, sensor_height FROM camera_calibration WHERE focal_length > 50;
SELECT principal_point_x, principal_point_y FROM camera_calibration WHERE sensor_width < 36;
SELECT distortion_coefficients FROM camera_calibration WHERE sensor_height > 30 AND sensor_width > 20;
SELECT * FROM camera_calibration WHERE sensor_width > 20 AND sensor_height < 15;
SELECT id, camera_model, focal_length FROM camera_calibration WHERE sensor_height = 10;
SELECT camera_model, sensor_width, sensor_height FROM camera_calibration WHERE focal_length >= 50;
SELECT id, camera_model, principal_point_x, principal_point_y FROM camera_calibration WHERE sensor_width BETWEEN 15 AND 25;
SELECT id, camera_model, distortion_coefficients FROM camera_calibration WHERE sensor_height < 10 OR focal_length > 70;
SELECT id, focal_length, principal_point_x, principal_point_y, distortion_coefficients FROM camera_calibration_parameters;
SELECT focal_length, principal_point_x FROM camera_calibration_parameters;
SELECT id, principal_point_x, distortion_coefficients FROM camera_calibration_parameters WHERE focal_length > 50;
SELECT * FROM camera_calibration_parameters ORDER BY focal_length DESC;
SELECT id, principal_point_y, distortion_coefficients FROM camera_calibration_parameters WHERE principal_point_y < 100;
SELECT * FROM camera_calibration_parameters ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT focal_length, principal_point_x FROM camera_calibration_parameters WHERE focal_length > 100;
SELECT id, focal_length, distortion_coefficients FROM camera_calibration_parameters WHERE principal_point_y < 200;
SELECT * FROM geometric_transformations WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, translation_vector FROM geometric_transformations ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT camera_id, focal_length, principal_point_x, principal_point_y FROM camera_calibrations;
SELECT distortion_id, k1, k2, k3 FROM distortion_parameters;
SELECT matrix_id, rotation_matrix, translation_vector FROM transformation_matrices;
SELECT camera_id, focal_length, principal_point_x, principal_point_y FROM camera_calibrations ORDER BY camera_id DESC;
SELECT matrix_id, rotation_matrix, translation_vector FROM transformation_matrices WHERE matrix_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM camera_calibrations WHERE focal_length > 50.0;
SELECT camera_id, principal_point_x, principal_point_y FROM camera_calibrations WHERE camera_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM distortion_parameters WHERE k1 < -0.1 ORDER BY k2 DESC;
SELECT camera_id, focal_length, principal_point_x, principal_point_y FROM camera_calibrations WHERE focal_length BETWEEN 30.0 AND 70.0;

SELECT d.distortion_id, d.k1, d.k2, d.k3, c.camera_id, c.focal_length, c.principal_point_x, c.principal_point_y FROM distortion_parameters d JOIN camera_calibrations c ON d.distortion_id = c.camera_id;
SELECT * FROM camera_calibrations;
SELECT id, fx, fy FROM camera_calibrations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, k1, k2 FROM distortion_coefficients ORDER BY k2 DESC;
SELECT calibration_date, success FROM calibration_results WHERE success = true;
SELECT * FROM image_dimensions WHERE image_width > 100 AND image_height < 200;
SELECT * FROM camera_calibrations WHERE fx > 0.5;
SELECT id, image_width, image_height FROM image_dimensions WHERE image_width < 1920;
SELECT id, k1, k2 FROM distortion_coefficients ORDER BY k1 DESC;
SELECT id, calibration_date FROM calibration_results WHERE success = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM camera_calibrations WHERE fx < 0.5 AND fy > 0.6;
SELECT * FROM CameraParameters;
SELECT id, fx, fy FROM CameraParameters ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ImageMetadata WHERE camera_id = 2;
SELECT calibration_date, calibration_type FROM CalibrationHistory WHERE calibration_accuracy > 0.9;
SELECT rotation_matrix, translation_vector FROM TransformationMatrix WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CameraParameters WHERE id = 1;
SELECT k1, k2, k3 FROM DistortionParameters WHERE k1 > 0.05;
SELECT id, rotation_matrix[1], translation_vector[1] FROM TransformationMatrix WHERE id = 3;
SELECT image_name, capture_timestamp FROM ImageMetadata WHERE capture_timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT calibration_date, calibration_type FROM CalibrationHistory WHERE calibration_accuracy > 0.90;
